Title: Erratum: Population vulnerability to COVID-19 in Europe: a burden of disease analysis (Archives of Public Health (2020) 78 (47) DOI: 10.1186/s13690-020-00433-y)
Abstract: © 2020 The Author(s). Reference:.Following publication of the original article [1], the authors identified an error in the author name of Brecht Devleesschauwer. The incorrect author name is: Brecht Devleeschauwer The correct author name is: Brecht Devleesschauwer The author group has been updated above and the original article [1] has been corrected.
SubjectAreas: Public Health, Environmental and Occupational Health
